name: Star Survivor - Prologue
description:
Join our DISCORD

One vs Thousands


This is the free prologue version of Star Survivor with new weapons, ships and campaign mode!

You are the last ship, survive the endless swarm with every overpowered weapon and upgrade the fleet has to offer.

🌌 New Campaign mode - build your deck as you go
🌌 New Endless mode - shoot for the top score
🌌 New Scout Ship with special invulnerability shield while boosting
🌌 New Weapons * 3 with upgrades

The Last Ship against the Endless


In this rogue-lite survival asteroids game, select from a variety of weapons and upgrades to create unique and overpowered builds every run. Carefully control your ship with Newtonian physics past the swarm of thousands of enemies. Each kill will gain you resources to upgrade your vessel, unlock new ships, or stack the odds in your favor.

Build Weapon Combos for each Quadrant


With a variety of weapons that combo with each other depending on how you upgrade them and where the weapons are slotted on your ship, you can create swarm-smashing overpowered builds. But beware, the alien swamp will harden itself against your efforts.

Board your Spaceship, Captain!


Choose from a selection of star ships that offer a variety of unique gameplay experiences and equipment synergies.

That time Deckbuilding met the Bullet Hell in the Space


Turn the odds in your favor with Challenge Mode. Unlock new cards to buy and add to your deck, so that you will only get those items when leveling up in combat. Upgrade cards to increase the power of your strategic builds. What a fun twist to the randomness of rogue-lites!

Choose the Path of your Interstellar Travel


In Campaign mode, choose your path wisely and build your ship as you conquer each sector on your way to slay the Endless Queens. If you are the bounty hunter type — hit the Hard Mode to earn some credits! Then shoot for the top score in the Endless Mode & share your numbers with other commanders!Enjoying the Prologue? Wishlist the Full Game — you won't regret it~https://store.steampowered.com/app/2060750/Star_Survivor/

Big inspirations from games such as: Vampire Survivor, 20 Minutes Till Dawn, Soul Stone Survivors, Rogue Genesia, Brotato, Demon Slayer Spellbook, Void Scrappers, Boneraiser Minions, Nova Drift, Runic Survivor, Gunlocked
